column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////Came here on a Tuesday mid-morning
column2: waited only a few minutes before being seated.  Greeters and waitstaff were very good and excellent respectively.   Beverage assortment was extensive
column3: coffee offerings were delicious without any hint of bitterness.  We ordered breakfast; eggs
column6: all arrived quickly and were absolutely fantastic.  Great place for breakfast or brunch and more than lived up to the expectation set by previous reviews.  As an aside
column8: especially given the quality of ingredients
column9: better than our breakfast served at a 4 star hotel for twice the price.
